snippet.title: Waking Violet launch trailer
snippet.description:
Waking Violet is a 2D top-down puzzle game that mixes and twists the classic mechanics of the genre with powerful spells. Fireballs? Clones? Rewind time? Everything's possible!

Waking Violet will launch on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation Vita, Steam, iOS and Google Play Store.
